content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 pound fresh or frozen cranberries" )

content.text: 2 cups white sugar, or to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "2 cups white sugar, or to taste" )

content.text: 0) Place the cranberries and water into a large pot.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the cranberries"@9:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "water"@29:34 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "a large pot"@40:51 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Bring to a boil and cook just until the berries pop, about 5 minutes.
2) Remove from the heat and let stand at room temperature until cold, several hours.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "stand"@32:37 / AC
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "room temperature"@41:57 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until cold"@58:68 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "several hours"@70:83 / DUR )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:source ( "the heat"@15:23 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Strain out the cranberries and stir the orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice and sugar into the liquid.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Strain out"@3:13 / AC
		:ppt ( "the cranberries"@14:29 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "stir"@34:38 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the orange juice"@39:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "pineapple juice"@57:72 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "lemon juice"@74:85 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "sugar"@90:95 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the liquid"@101:111 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Add the cinnamon stick, whole cloves and allspice berries.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the cinnamon stick"@7:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "whole cloves"@27:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "allspice berries"@44:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
